functions.name: AcidTankLevels
HaulTruck
functions.body:
{
// 2025-06-17 Eric Smith: Updated Gallon/Liter conversion
let varName = "active";
database("Global").RegistryStreamsPivot_MV
    | where OpStatsLoader =~ "true"
    | where status == "active"
    | where isnotempty(SAPEquipmentID)
        and isnotempty(SAPMeasurementID)
        and isnotempty(SAPMeasurementType)
    | join kind=leftouter (
database("Global").FCTS_CURRENT_VALUE
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp,*) by sensor_id
    | project site_code,sensor_id, timestamp, value
    ) on
    $left.sensor_id == $right.sensor_id
| extend value = toreal(value)
// | extend case(site_code == "SAMEM", value = value/3.785, value) // <------ REMOVED 2025-06-17 Eric Smith
| extend value = round(iff(site_code == "SAMEM" and sensor_id has "Fuel Consumption", value / 3.785, value), 2) // <-------- ADDED 2025-06-17 Eric Smith
| extend value = round(iff(uom == "s", value / 3600.0, value), 2)  // Convert seconds to hours if uom is 'S'
| extend value = round(iff(uom == "m", value / 1609.344, value),2)  // Convert meters to Miles if uom is 'm'    // <-------- ADDED 2025-10-03 Michael Ibarra
| project SAPEquipmentID, SAPMeasurementID, SAPMeasurementType, timestamp=datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp,'US/Arizona'), value, uom=SAPUOM
| where isnan(value) == false
}

functions.name: HaulTruck_DEV
functions.body:
{
// 2025-06-17 Baskar Selvaraj: Created dev version of the function
let TimeZone = 'US/Arizona';
let TimeNow = datetime_utc_to_local(now(), TimeZone);
let Time1dayAgo = TimeNow - 2d;
database("Global").RegistryStreamsPivot_MV
    | where OpStatsLoader =~ "true"
    | where status == "active"
    | where isnotempty(SAPEquipmentID)
        and isnotempty(SAPMeasurementID)
        and isnotempty(SAPMeasurementType)
    | join kind=leftouter (
        database("Global").FCTS_CURRENT_VALUE
        | summarize arg_max(timestamp, value, data_source) by sensor_id
        | project sensor_id, timestamp, value, data_source
    ) on sensor_id
| extend timestampA = datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, TimeZone)
| extend value = toreal(value)
| extend Loadtimestamp = iff(isnull(timestampA) or timestampA <= Time1dayAgo, TimeNow, timestampA)
| extend Loadvalue = iff(isnull(value) or timestampA <= Time1dayAgo, 0.0, value)
| extend LoadSAPMeasurementType = iff(SAPMeasurementType == "COUNTER" and Loadvalue == 0, "VALUE", SAPMeasurementType)
| extend Check1 = iff(SAPMeasurementType != LoadSAPMeasurementType, "XXXX", "")
| extend Loadvalue = case(
    Loadvalue > 0 and site_code == "SAMEM" and sensor_id has "Fuel Consumption", round(Loadvalue / 3.785, 2),
    Loadvalue > 0 and uom == "s", round(Loadvalue / 3600.0, 2),
    Loadvalue > 0 and uom == "m", round(Loadvalue / 1609.344, 2),
    round(Loadvalue, 2)
)
| project SAPEquipmentID, SAPMeasurementID, SAPMeasurementType=LoadSAPMeasurementType, timestamp=Loadtimestamp, value=Loadvalue, uom=SAPUOM
| where isnan(value) == false
| order by SAPEquipmentID
}

];
let start = ago(3h);
let tph = source | project tphtag;
let tphflt = source | project tphflt;
let millpower = source | project millpowertag;
let classifieramps = source | project classifierampstag;
let classifierph = source | project classifierphtag;
let frontlaunder = source | project frontlaundertag;
let backlaunder = source | project backlaundertag;
let classifierphsp = source | project classifierphsptag;
let millstart = ago(7d);
let dischargedensitytags = manualmills | project dischargedensitytag;
let classifierdensitytags = manualmills | project classifierdensitytag;
let classifierwetgrindtags = manualmills | project classifierwetgrindtag;
let tph_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (tph)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, tph = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend tph_now = iff(tph < 10, 0.0, tph)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, tph_now;
let tph_flt_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (tphflt)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, tph_flt = toreal(value)
    | where tph_flt != 0
    | summarize tpoh = avg(tph_flt) by sensor_id;
let mill_power_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (millpower)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, mill_power_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend mill_power = iff(mill_power_raw < 10, 0.0, mill_power_raw)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, mill_power;
let classifier_amps_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (classifieramps)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_amps_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend classifier_amps = iff(classifier_amps_raw < 0.5, 0.0, classifier_amps_raw)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_amps;
let classifier_ph_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (classifierph)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_ph_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend classifier_ph = iff(classifier_ph_raw < 0.5, 0.0, classifier_ph_raw)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_ph;
let front_launder_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (frontlaunder)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, front_launder_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend front_launder = iff(front_launder_raw < 0.1, 0.0, front_launder_raw)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, front_launder;
let back_launder_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (backlaunder)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, back_launder_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend back_launder = iff(back_launder_raw < 0.1, 0.0, back_launder_raw)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, back_launder;
let classifier_phsp_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (classifierphsp)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_phsp_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend classifier_phsp = iff(classifier_phsp_raw < 0.5, 0.0, classifier_phsp_raw)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_phsp;
let discharge_density_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (dischargedensitytags)
    | where timestamp > millstart
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, discharge_density_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend density_discharge = iff(discharge_density_raw < 0 or discharge_density_raw > 100, 0.0, discharge_density_raw)
    | project sensor_id, density_discharge_timestamp = timestamp, density_discharge;
let classifier_density_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (classifierdensitytags)
    | where timestamp > millstart
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_density_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend density_classifier = iff(classifier_density_raw < 0 or classifier_density_raw > 100, 0.0, classifier_density_raw)
    | project sensor_id, density_classifier_timestamp = timestamp, density_classifier;
let classifier_wet_grind_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (classifierwetgrindtags)
    | where timestamp > millstart
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, classifier_wet_grind_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend wet_grind_classifier = iff(classifier_wet_grind_raw < 0 or classifier_wet_grind_raw > 100, 0.0, classifier_wet_grind_raw)
    | project sensor_id, wet_grind_classifier_timestamp = timestamp, wet_grind_classifier;
let result = source
    | join kind = fullouter tph_current on $left.tphtag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter tph_flt_current on $left.tphflt == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter mill_power_current on $left.millpowertag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter classifier_amps_current on $left.classifierampstag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter classifier_ph_current on $left.classifierphtag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter front_launder_current on $left.frontlaundertag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter back_launder_current on $left.backlaundertag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter classifier_phsp_current on $left.classifierphsptag == $right.sensor_id
    | extend tpoh = iff(isnull(tpoh), 0.0, tpoh)
    | extend tpoh_now = iff(isnull(tpoh), 0.0, tpoh)
    | extend mill_power = iff(isnull(mill_power), 0.0, mill_power)
    | extend classifier_amps = iff(isnull(classifier_amps), 0.0, classifier_amps)
    | extend classifier_ph = iff(isnull(classifier_ph), 0.0, classifier_ph)
    | extend front_launder = iff(isnull(front_launder), 0.0, front_launder)
    | extend back_launder = iff(isnull(back_launder), 0.0, back_launder)
    | extend classifier_phsp = iff(isnull(classifier_phsp), 0.0, classifier_phsp)
    | project
        section,
        ballmill,
        tph_now,
        tpoh_now,
        mill_power,
        classifier_amps,
        classifier_ph,
        front_launder,
        back_launder,
        classifier_phsp
    | order by ballmill asc;
let manualresult = manualmills
    | join kind = fullouter discharge_density_current on $left.dischargedensitytag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter classifier_density_current on $left.classifierdensitytag == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter classifier_wet_grind_current on $left.classifierwetgrindtag == $right.sensor_id
    | extend density_discharge = iff(isnull(density_discharge), 0.0, density_discharge)
    | extend density_discharge_timestamp = iff(isnull(density_discharge_timestamp), millstart, density_discharge_timestamp)
    | extend density_classifier = iff(isnull(density_classifier), 0.0, density_classifier)
    | extend density_classifier_timestamp = iff(isnull(density_classifier_timestamp), millstart, density_classifier_timestamp)
    | extend wet_grind_classifier = iff(isnull(wet_grind_classifier), 0.0, wet_grind_classifier)
    | extend wet_grind_classifier_timestamp = iff(isnull(wet_grind_classifier_timestamp), millstart, wet_grind_classifier_timestamp)
    | project
        section,
        ballmill,
        density_discharge,
        density_discharge_timestamp,
        density_classifier,
        density_classifier_timestamp,
        wet_grind_classifier,
        wet_grind_classifier_timestamp
    | order by ballmill asc;
let final = result
    | join kind = inner manualresult on $left.ballmill == $right.ballmill
    | project
        section,
        ballmill,
        tph_now  = round(tph_now, 2),
        tpoh_now = round(tpoh_now, 2),
        mill_power = round(mill_power, 2),
        classifier_amps = round(classifier_amps, 2),
        classifier_ph = round(classifier_ph, 2),
        front_launder = round(front_launder, 2),
        back_launder = round(back_launder, 2),
        classifier_phsp = round(classifier_phsp, 2),
        density_discharge = round(density_discharge, 2),
        density_discharge_timestamp,
        density_classifier = round(density_classifier, 2),
        density_classifier_timestamp,
        wet_grind_classifier = round(wet_grind_classifier, 2),
        wet_grind_classifier_timestamp,
        last_modified_date = now()
    | order by ballmill asc
    | extend json = pack_all()
    | summarize result = make_list(json);
final | project TimestampUtc=now(), Value=tostring(result)
}

functions.name: Morenci_Batman_Section_Aggregates
functions.body:
{
let section = datatable(section: int, tphsec: string, gpmsec: string)[
    1, "MOR-WIC01_SECTION01_PV", "MOR-FIC-3161_PV",
    2, "MOR-WIC01_SECTION02_PV", "MOR-FIC-3165_PV",
    3, "MOR-WIC01_SECTION03_PV", "MOR-FIC-3171_PV",
    4, "MOR-WIC01_SECTION04_PV", "MOR-FIC-3175_PV"
];
let mills = datatable(section: int, ballmill: int, tphflt: string)[
    1, 1, "MOR-WIC0101_PV_FLT",
    1, 2, "MOR-WIC0102_PV_FLT",
    1, 3, "MOR-WIC0103_PV_FLT",
    1, 4, "MOR-WIC0104_PV_FLT",
    1, 5, "MOR-WIC0105_PV_FLT",
    1, 6, "MOR-WIC0106_PV_FLT",
    1, 7, "MOR-WIC0107_PV_FLT",
    1, 8, "MOR-WIC0108_PV_FLT",
    2, 9, "MOR-WIC0109_PV_FLT",
    2, 10, "MOR-WIC0110_PV_FLT",
    2, 11, "MOR-WIC0111_PV_FLT",
    2, 12, "MOR-WIC0112_PV_FLT",
    2, 13, "MOR-WIC0113_PV_FLT",
    2, 14, "MOR-WIC0114_PV_FLT",
    2, 15, "MOR-WIC0115_PV_FLT",
    2, 16, "MOR-WIC0116_PV_FLT",
    3, 17, "MOR-WIC0117_PV_FLT",
    3, 18, "MOR-WIC0118_PV_FLT",
    3, 19, "MOR-WIC0119_PV_FLT",
    3, 20, "MOR-WIC0120_PV_FLT",
    3, 21, "MOR-WIC0121_PV_FLT",
    3, 22, "MOR-WIC0122_PV_FLT",
    4, 23, "MOR-WIC0123_PV_FLT",
    4, 24, "MOR-WIC0124_PV_FLT",
    4, 25, "MOR-WIC0125_PV_FLT",
    4, 26, "MOR-WIC0126_PV_FLT",
    4, 27, "MOR-WIC0127_PV_FLT",
    3, 28, "MOR-WIC0128_PV_FLT",
    4, 29, "MOR-WIC0129_PV_FLT",
    4, 30, "MOR-WIC0130_PV_FLT",
    3, 31, "MOR-WIC0131_PV_FLT",
    4, 32, "MOR-WIC0132_PV_FLT",
];
let manualsection = datatable(section: int, distributorwetgrindtag: string)[
    1, "MOR-MorenciMill-Section01-DistributorWetGrind",
    2, "MOR-MorenciMill-Section02-DistributorWetGrind",
    3, "MOR-MorenciMill-Section03-DistributorWetGrind",
    4, "MOR-MorenciMill-Section04-DistributorWetGrind"
];
let start = ago(3h);
let tphflt = mills | project tphflt;
let tphsec = section | project tphsec;
let gpmsec = section | project gpmsec;
let sectionstart = ago(7d);
let distributorwetgrindtags = manualsection | project distributorwetgrindtag;
let tph_flt_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (tphflt)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, tph_flt = toreal(value)
    | where tph_flt != 0
    | summarize tpoh = avg(tph_flt) by sensor_id
    | join mills on $left.sensor_id == $right.tphflt
    | project sensor_id, tpoh, section
    | summarize tpoh_sec_now = avg(tpoh) by section;
let tph_sec_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (tphsec)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, tphsec = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend tph_sec_now = iff(tphsec < 10, 0.0, tphsec)
    | project sensor_id, tph_sec_now;
let gpm_sec_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (gpmsec)
    | where timestamp > start
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, gpmsec = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend gpm_sec_now = iff(gpmsec < 10, 0.0, gpmsec)
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, gpm_sec_now;
let distributor_wet_grind_current = database("Morenci").FCTS
    | where sensor_id in~ (distributorwetgrindtags)
    | where timestamp > sectionstart
    | project sensor_id, timestamp, distributor_wet_grind_raw = toreal(value)
    | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by sensor_id
    | extend wet_grind_distributor = iff(distributor_wet_grind_raw < 0 or distributor_wet_grind_raw > 100, 0.0, distributor_wet_grind_raw)
    | project sensor_id, wet_grind_distributor_timestamp = timestamp, wet_grind_distributor;
let result = section
    | join kind = fullouter tph_flt_current on $left.section == $right.section
    | join kind = fullouter tph_sec_current on $left.tphsec == $right.sensor_id
    | join kind = fullouter gpm_sec_current on $left.gpmsec == $right.sensor_id
    | extend tpoh_avg_now = iff(isnull(tpoh_sec_now), 0.0, tpoh_sec_now)
    | extend tph_sec_now = iff(isnull(tph_sec_now), 0.0, tph_sec_now)
    | extend gpm_sec_now = iff(isnull(gpm_sec_now), 0.0, gpm_sec_now)
    | project section, tpoh_avg_now, tph_sec_now, gpm_sec_now
    | order by section asc;
let manualresult = manualsection
    | join kind = fullouter distributor_wet_grind_current on $left.distributorwetgrindtag == $right.sensor_id
    | extend wet_grind_distributor = iff(isnull(wet_grind_distributor), 0.0, wet_grind_distributor)
    | extend wet_grind_distributor_timestamp = iff(isnull(wet_grind_distributor_timestamp), sectionstart, wet_grind_distributor_timestamp)
    | project section, wet_grind_distributor, wet_grind_distributor_timestamp
    | order by section asc;
let final = result
    | join kind = inner manualresult on $left.section == $right.section
    | project
        section,
        tpoh_avg_now = round(tpoh_avg_now, 2),
        tph_sec_now = round(tph_sec_now, 2),
        gpm_sec_now = round(gpm_sec_now, 2),
        wet_grind_distributor = round(wet_grind_distributor, 2),
        wet_grind_distributor_timestamp,
        last_modified_date = now()
    | order by section asc
    | extend json = pack_all()
    | summarize result = make_list(json);
final | project TimestampUtc=now(), Value=tostring(result)
}

FaeJobsStatus
functions.body:
{
let starttime = ago(1h);
database('Global').FaeLogsIngest
| where siteCode == Site
  and start > starttime
| extend age_seconds = round((now() - start)/1s,0)
| summarize arg_max(start,*) by jobId
| mv-expand actionLogs
| extend
    action_name = tostring(actionLogs.name),
    action_type = tostring(actionLogs.type),
    action_message = tostring(actionLogs.message)
| where
    (action_type == "Step" and action_name contains "grafana")
    or (action_type == "Step" and action_name contains "payload")
| extend action_name = case(action_name contains "payload", "payload", action_name contains "grafana", "grafana_link", "")
| project siteCode, name, start, age_seconds, status, action_name, action_type, action_message
| order by name asc
| evaluate pivot(action_name, take_any(action_message))
| project-away action_type
}

functions.name: FaeUi_GetRecentJobLogs
functions.body:
{
    database('Global').FaeLogs_MV
    | where jobId == JobId
    and job_status == JobStatus
    and job_start > ago(7d)
    and action_type == "Trigger"
    | order by job_start desc
    | take 20
    | extend trigger_sensor_id = action_name
    | extend duration_seconds = round((job_end-job_start)/1s,3)
    | project jobId, id, start=job_start, duration_seconds, trigger_sensor_id
}

functions.name: FaeUi_GetJobInvocationLog
functions.body:
{
database('Global').FaeJobLogs
| where id == RunId
| extend duration_seconds = round((action_end-action_start)/1s,3)
| order by action_start asc
| project action_name, action_type, action_start, duration_seconds, action_message, action_status, parent_name, parent_type
}

functions.name: UDETripLogs
FaeRunIDLog
AllUDETripLogs
functions.body:
{
database('Global').FaeJobLogs
| where siteCode == Site
| where job_start >= StartTime
| where action_name == "UDE_Payload"
| order by job_start asc
| project id, job_name, job_start, action_message
| extend 
    TriggeredOn = todatetime(todynamic(action_message).TriggeredOn),
    UDEValue = toint(todynamic(action_message).Value),
    SAPEquipmentID = tostring(todynamic(action_message).Number)
| project-away action_message
| order by TriggeredOn desc
| where UDEValue == 1
}
